title: Assessing the vulnerability of Elasmobranch species in the Bay of Bengal: Insights from Lakkha gill net fishery of Bangladesh

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Rupesh Das, Md. Hasan Faruque, Sadman Sakib, Md. Taslim Ahmad, Rubaia Nishat Seba, Md. Al Zahid, Most. Nilufa Yeasmin, Md. Mazharul Islam
